name: api_math_Quaternion
description: Quaternions are used to represent rotations.

properties.name: eulerAngles
properties.description: Returns or sets the euler angle representation of the rotation in degrees.

properties.name: normalized
properties.description: Returns this quaternion with a magnitude of 1 (Read Only).

properties.name: w
properties.description: W component of the Quaternion. Do not directly modify quaternions.

properties.name: x
properties.description: X component of the Quaternion. Don't modify this directly unless you know quaternions inside out.

properties.name: y
properties.description: Y component of the Quaternion. Don't modify this directly unless you know quaternions inside out.

properties.name: z
properties.description: Z component of the Quaternion. Don't modify this directly unless you know quaternions inside out.
